scripts.release-patch: git checkout master && npm run build && git commit -a -m 'Build'; npm version patch && git push origin master --tags && npm publish --access=public
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master && npm run build && git commit -a -m 'Build'; npm version minor && git push origin master --tags && npm publish --access=public
scripts.release-major: git checkout master && npm run build && git commit -a -m 'Build'; npm version major && git push origin master --tags && npm publish --access=public
